## CreateCookieOptions.path property

The 'Path' attribute of the cookie represents the path of the cookie (See [RFC6265 Section 5.2.4](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc6265.html#section-5.2.4)<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
path?: string | null;
```
